definition: guarantee period/warranty period
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
surname Xiu
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: He buys new and sells when the warranty runs out.
sentences.chinese: 他買新車開，一過保修期就賣。

sentences.english: Your watch will be repaired free if it is still under guarantee.
sentences.chinese: 你的手錶在保修期內可享受免費修理。

sentences.english: Cars known for dependability will guarantee parts for as many as 70,000 miles.
sentences.chinese: 可信賴的品牌汽車可以提供7萬英里的保修期限。

sentences.english: Housing quality book documenting the various parts of warranty period.
sentences.chinese: 質保書詳細記載了房屋各個部位的保修期限。

sentences.english: The warranty period begins on the date of vehicle invoice.
sentences.chinese: 通用汽車的保修期自購車發票日期起算。

sentences.english: IF exceed the warranty period, you need to pay for the cost if you want to apply for warranty service.
sentences.chinese: 超過保修期限的上潤產品申請保修須支付一定費用。

sentences.english: The Chinese consumers say they were never offered the extended warranty.
sentences.chinese: 中國消費者稱，他們沒有享受到延長保修期的服務。

sentences.english: A: How long is the warranty?
How about repairs after the warranty expires?
sentences.chinese: 在保修期過後的修理怎麼辦呢？

sentences.english: How long is the warranty period provided by Supplier?
sentences.chinese: 機器設備供應商提供的保修期多長？

sentences.english: The total amount so retained shall be paid to the Supplier by the Purchaser at the expiry of the guarantee period.
sentences.chinese: 所保留的總金額應在保修期終止時由買方付給供方。

sentences.english: By age 25, he felt he was “way past warranty.
sentences.chinese: 在25歲地時候，他覺得他是“過了保修期”。

sentences.english: The fridges is covered by a one-year warranty.
President Obama said the United States government will  stand by your car's  warranty.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬總統說，美國政府將擔保你們汽車的保修期。

sentences.english: Specific warranty scope and minimum warranty duration shall be laid down by the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 具體的保修範圍和最低保修期限由國務院規定。

sentences.english: The repaired products are still guaranteed during the remaining warranty period.
sentences.chinese: 修理過的產品將在原保修期剩下的時間裏被保修。

definition: to promise to keep sth in good repair/guarantee/warranty
maintenance (of equipment)/to protect and maintain
to replace a purchase/to exchange a purchase
house call fee/callout fee
to guarantee refund or replacement (of faulty or unsatisfactory goods)
to return a product for another item
to guarantee refund (for faulty or unsatisfactory goods)
to return merchandise/to withdraw a product
to dismantle a machine/to terminate a telephone service
after-sales service
consumables
to replace with sth new/to upgrade
"three-guarantee service": repair, exchange, refund
(of electronic goods) refurbished
authorized goods/genuine goods/crudely-made goods
depreciation
